title.rendered: Our Humanitarian Training Courses 2022 are online

content.rendered:
learn

Our Humanitarian Training Courses 2022 are online!

December 14, 2021

Find the training course made for you! Whether a recent graduate, an experienced humanitarian, a high school graduate or an employee looking to change career, whatever your profile or plan, find a training course to suit you at Bioforce among the 172 courses, in 14 countries and online.

A training offer with lots of new features

Easy access 

With our self-paced diploma courses, you can be trained over several years without taking long absences from your work. The modules that make up these diploma courses are also available individually.

Available where you work

In Europe Lyon and Paris (France)

In Africa Abidjan (Ivory Coast) new, Bamako (Mali), Bangui (CAR), Bobo Dioulasso and Ouagadougou (Burkina Faso), Conakry (Guinea) new, Dakar (Senegal), Goma and Kinshasa (DRC), N’Djamena (Chad), Niamey (Niger) and Yaoundé (Cameroon)

In the Middle East Amman (Jordan), Beirut (Lebanon) and Erbil (Iraq)

And online!

A training offer that will help you become an effective and operational aid worker

Get ready for the field

Training courses are designed in collaboration with NGOs, and led by experienced humanitarians. 70% practical applications: case studies and simulations of full-scale humanitarian missions.

Attracting the attention of NGOs

For nearly 40 years, Bioforce has been the reference training partner for humanitarian organisations, your future employers, who are strongly involved in designing the courses. They know that you will perfectly matches their needs.

Download the calendar

Take advantage of an overview of our training courses to find the one that suits you and note it in your agenda!
Read the calendar online or download the pdf

Discover the calendar

Read more

Find out more about the scheduled training courses: program, training objectives, pre-requisites, cost and registration form!

Access to the web list of training courses
